attributes.action: Give access to NHS dental care and services back to everyone in all counties.
attributes.additional_details: Adults are finding it impossible to access dental care anywhere in the UK. The reason being is that every dental practice has gone or is going private. This means that people on benefits, pensioners, some families and low wage earners are going completely without dental care because they cannot afford to go to a private dentist. Dental care is important for EVERYONE'S overall health not just those that can afford it.
attributes.background: We are in desperate need of NHS dental care. I want the Government to give people who cannot afford private dental care access to NHS dental care.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638133

Healthcare, including dentistry, is devolved to the Northern Ireland Assembly, the Scottish Government and the Welsh Parliament.
